alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:37AM CST until February 20 at 4:52AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River near Sullivan. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Sullivan. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, At this height the Arapaho Campground will evacuate campers. This campground is about 8.5 river miles downstream from the gage. About 14.3 miles upstream of the gage... Cave Road access to Ozark Outdoors begins flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CST Saturday was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.9 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Sullivan 11.0 14.7 Sat 8 am 9.6 7.3 6.2 5.6 5.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
